page.title: 16W & J WHITEHEAD Ltd.BRADFORD
page.content:
W & J Whitehead is the { largest {privately owned wool mill in the {World. } They still carry on the specialised activities of wool topmaking, combing & worsted spinning which the founders William & Joseph Whitehead began in 1858.
One of the largest producers of Australian and South African merino tops in the industry they supply worsted-yarn, wool or synthetic, to the hosiery, knitwear and weaving sectors.
The company spend about Â£\m weekly on wool purchases. About 50% of output each month is tops for export. {"Marksman" knitting yarns}are one of the products from Whiteheads, on which over{600 employees} depend for their livelihood.
